Im Marco, i have transport company “Ketolainen Transport LTD” World HQ based in London,UK and also 2 branches in the EU - Oslo,NO and Limassol,CY.

In addition to these companies i also manage 2 different cleaning companies ‘Dirt and Dust Cleaning Company’ in Oslo,NO and ‘Clean and Shine 4 U’ in Hagan,NO

I have 2 wonderful daughters ‘Eiffel May and Hazel Christine’
